attributes.action: Allow carers to work 16 hours without losing carers allowance
attributes.additional_details: As a carer would you like to work 16 hours and not lose your carers allowance ? Lots of carers are effected by how the goverment stop us or prevent us from going back to work ! As we would lose carers status and carers allowance ! We would like to work and not lose carers allowance over £0.96p !!! Sign and help future carers and all that care now thank you so much x
